edit:
SKIP DOWNLOADING EPISODE 103 KOPIE (103 is twice in torrent)



Hope everyone seed after downloading (please seed at least what youve downloaded.)
maybe you can seed while ur watching?


If you dont know how to seed:

  
I don't know what client u use but i recommend utorrent http://www.utorrent.com/download.php
If you completed downloading and just dont remove the downloaded torrent then you can seed for how long u want.

If you don't have utorrent yet and u've downloaded it you dont have to download it agian to seed. u can just:

click download torrent here-->save the torrent-->then click file/add torrent--> now click the torrent and press stop--> then right click the torrent--> go to advanced/select download location-->when u selected u right click torrent and press Force Re-Check.

Maybe the force re check stops at 99.9% or something so you have to download rest but i think that wont take to long.


HolyArrows
